701353f-a.title: Bronx: Jerome Avenue - 199th Street (East)
701353f-a.text:
(1)
Jerome Ave., west side, at East 199th Street, showing Italian
gardens with crudely erected fences.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Part of the same. In the background appear buildings facing on
the west side of Eeservoir Ase.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
A detail of the same area.
May s, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

700314f-a.title: Bronx: 199th Street (East) - Jerome Avenue
700314f-a.text:
2-18 East 199th Street (left), at the S.E. corner of Jerome Ave., showing the three-unit apartment house, the Wells Court. On the extreme left appears the 5-story building at the S.W. corner of Grand Concourse.
About 1929.
General Photographic Company.
